XYZ is a Verified Not By AI Project

What the Not By AI badges mean

XYZ Inc affirms that the content indicated below is majorly or entirely created by one or more humans. It adheres to the 90% rule1 and has undergone human review.2

Approved Badge(s)

Creative Assets

draft

ideas

draft with feedback

concepting

  1. The 90% Rule states that at least 90% of the content must be created by humans. The 90% Rule does not apply to the use of AI for inspiration purposes, supporting legal documents, non-user facing content, looking for grammatical errors and typos, or translating content.
  2. The use of the Not By AI badges and the human review process do not guarantee that the content is not majorly created by AI, we are dedicated to enhancing our verification process and credibility.
